Ireland's Feature Wall Specialist

Imagine your special room enhanced by the beauty of a stunning custom designed feature wall.

About our work

Discover the potential

Make an impact in your living room, bedroom, or other special room with one of our stylish feature walls including a TV wall unit, stylish fireplace and inset lighting.

As your feature wall specialist, we work with you to create and co-design a custom installation, uniquely designed to suit your needs and to make you stand out.

Also checkout out our new curved units below. We are the only feature wall specialist who can design and build these.

About Featured Walls & Ceilings

We have been specialists in designing and building custom feature walls and ceiling installations in Ireland for the last 20 years.

We are proud to have worked with some of the biggest multi-national companies in Ireland and abroad over the years including:

  • Pfizer
  • Hewlett Packard;
  • Johnson & Johnson;
  • Warner Lambert;
  • Dunnes Stores; and
  • Dubai International Airport

We bring this experience and professionalism now to our specialist feature wall design work and we will make sure that our work for you is to the very highest standard.
